body:
I don't understand the point of the king's game, tbh. Does it ever really happen like that? If you are in it to hook up, just get to it, no need for the weird gradual escalation. Even if it's to probe the others' feelings and opinions before you commit, at some point they become clear and you should just take it tet-a-tet from there. But I'm glad, that was the most timely "Absolutely not" ever. Finally a doujin with characters that speak their mind when push comes to shove. Why is that so rare? Though maybe it should have been earlier, at even her being seen naked by the other guy. 
The alternative was regicide.
Damn, if the artist really shows the guys kissing, it would've been a bisexual hentai. Haha. Though, this is still quite good.
